summary: The module provides utilities to combine two ARPA‑format n‑gram language models using weighted interpolation, compute the resulting model's perplexity on a test dataset, and optionally compile the merged model into a binary KenLM format for use in speech recognition pipelines.
business_intent: Allow speech‑recognition teams to enhance language model accuracy by merging existing n‑gram models, evaluate the merged model's quality, and generate an optimized binary LM ready for deployment in ASR systems.
